humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: Based on the pathology report, there are metastases in 4 or more axillary lymph nodes on the right side (Rule 13). Specifically, the report mentions metastatic carcinoma in 3 out of 3 lymph nodes in the additional level 1 lymph node on the right axilla, and in 4 out of 4 lymph nodes in the additional right level 2 axillary contents. This information supports the prediction of N3 stage.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has metastatic carcinoma in 1 out of 1 sentinel lymph node in the left axilla (pN1a) and metastatic carcinoma in 3 out of 3 additional level 1 lymph nodes in the right axilla, with extranodal extension (pN2a). Additionally, there is metastatic carcinoma in 4 out of 4 additional level 2 axillary contents, with extranodal extension (pN3a). The highest N stage reported is N3a, but since there is no mention of supraclavicular or infraclavicular involvement, the final N stage is N2.
